            def index

            def update

            # Activates or deactivates a user in a organisation
        
      45.

            # PATCH /admin_users/:id/active
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
            def active
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              u_role = UserWithRole.new(User.find(params[:id]), current_organisation)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              if params[:active] == 'true' and valid_organisation_users?
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                u_role.link.update_attribute(:active, true)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              else
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                u_role.link.update_attribute(:active, false)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              @user = u_role.user
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              render 'active.js'
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
            end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
            # DELETE
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              user = current_organisation.users.find(params[:id])
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              unless user.last_sign_in_at?
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                user.destroy
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = 'El usuario fue eliminado.'
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              else
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = 'No es posible borrar el usuario, desactive el usuario si desea que no ingrese a su sistema.'
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              redirect_to configurations_path
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
            end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
            private
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
              def create_params
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                params.require(:admin_user)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                .permit(:email, :first_name, :last_name, :role)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                .merge(organisation: current_organisation)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
              end
        
      81. 
      
        
    81.

          class ApplicationController < ActionController::Base

          1

              case

              when (c.request.xhr? or params[:xhr]) then false

              when params[:print].present?          then 'print'

      24.

          1

      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
            # especial redirect for ajax requests
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
            def redirect_ajax(klass, options = {})
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              if request.xhr?
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                serialized_xhr_response klass, options
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              else
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                url = options[:url] || klass
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                if request.delete?
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                  set_redirect_options(klass, options)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  url = "/#{klass.class.to_s.downcase.pluralize}" unless url.is_a?(String)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                redirect_to url
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
            end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
            # Add some helper methods to the controllers
        
      43.

            def path_sub(path, extras = {})

              def set_redirect_options(klass, options)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                if klass.destroyed?
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                  case
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                  when (options[:notice].blank? and flash[:notice].blank?)
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    flash[:notice] = "Se ha eliminado el registro correctamente."
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  when (options[:notice] and flash[:notice].blank?)
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                    flash[:notice] = options[:notice]
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  end
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                else
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                  if flash[:error].blank? and klass.errors.any?
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                    txt = options[:error] ? options[:error] : "No se pudo borrar el registro: #{klass.errors[:base].join(", ")}."
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                    flash[:error] = txt
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                  elsif flash[:error].blank?
        
      92. 
      
        
    92.

      93. 
      
        
    93.

      94. 
      
        
    94.

      95. 
      
        
    95.

              def serialized_xhr_response(klass, options)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                r = ControllerServiceSerializer.new(klass)
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                options.merge(methods: [:destroyed?])  if request.delete?
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                render json: r.to_json(only: options[:only], except: options[:except], methods: options[:methods])
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142.

            def update
        
      14.

              case
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              when move_up?
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                @attachment.move_up(position)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              when move_down?
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                @attachment.move_down(position)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              else
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                render json: @attachment, status: STATUS_ERROR
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22.

      27.

    41.

      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
              def move_up?
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                !!(params[:attachment][:move] === 'up' && position)

    45. 
          
          
              end

      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1

    49.

      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          
        
      51.

              def position

      53.

    54.

      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  nil
        
      56.

      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              end
        
      58.

              def generate_csv(col_sep = ',')

    99. 
          
          
                require 'csv'

      101.

    102. 
          
          
                  csv << csv_header
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                  @contacts.per(200).find_each do |cont|
        
      104. 
      
        
    104.

      106.

    app/controllers/download_controller.rb

    0.0 % covered

    1. 
          
          
          class DownloadController < ApplicationController
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
            layout false
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            # GET /download/file/name
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            def download_pdf
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              send_file "#{download_file}.pdf", filename: "#{params[:name]}.pdf"
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            end
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            private
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              def download_file
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                if File.exists?("/tmp/#{params[:file]}.pdf")
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                  "/tmp/#{params[:file]}"
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                else
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                  "fail"
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              end

            def approve

              @expense.approve!

            def inventory

              # Method to search expenses on the index
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
              def search_expenses
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                if tag_ids
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  @expenses = Expenses::Query.index_includes Expense.any_tags(*tag_ids)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                else
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                  @expenses = Expenses::Query.new.index(params).order('date desc, accounts.id desc')
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                set_expenses_filters
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                @expenses = @expenses.page(@page)
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
              def set_expenses_filters
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                [:approved, :error, :due, :nulled, :inventory].each do |filter|
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  @expenses = @expenses.send(filter)  if params[filter].present?
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              end
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1
          
              def set_index_params
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                params[:all] = true unless [:approved, :error, :nulled, :due, :inventory].any? {|v| params[v].present? }
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
              end
        
      149.

              def set_store_and_expense
        
      32.

                @expense = Expense.active.find(params[:expense_id])

    33. 
          
          
                @store = Store.active.find(params[:store_id])
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                redirect_to expenses_path, alert: 'Ha seleccionado un almacen o un egreso invalido.' and return
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              end
        
      37.

              def search_incomes

    134.

    135.

      138.

      139. 
      
        
    139.

      142.

              def set_incomes_filters

                  @incomes = @incomes.send(filter)  if params[filter].present?
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
              end
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
          
        
      149.

              def set_store_and_income
        
      33.

                @income = Income.active.find(params[:income_id])

    34. 
          
          
                @store = Store.active.find(params[:store_id])
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                redirect_to incomes_path, alert: 'Ha seleccionado un almacen o un ingreso invalido.' and return
        
      37.

              end

                @income = Income.active.find(params[:income_id])
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                @store = Store.active.find(params[:store_id])
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                redirect_to incomes_path, alert: 'Ha seleccionado un almacen o un ingreso invalido.' and return
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
              def inventory_params
        
      40.

                params.require(:incomes_inventory_out).permit(
        
      41.

                  :description, :date, :store_id, :income_id,

      46.

    47. 
          
          
            private
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              def get_inventories
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                inv = Inventory.order("inventories.date desc, inventories.id desc")
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                .includes(:store, :store_to, :income, :expense, :creator)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                if params[:search].present?
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                  s = params[:search]
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  inv = inv.where{ref_number.like "%#{s}%"}
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                elsif params[:search].blank? && params[:date_start].present?
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  inv = inv.where(date: @date_range.range)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                inv.page(@page)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              def set_date_range
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                if params[:date_start].present? && params[:date_end].present?
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                  @date_range = DateRange.parse(params[:date_start], params[:date_end])
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                else
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                  @date_range = DateRange.default
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          end
        
      69.

            def create
        
      53.

            def update

              if @item.update_attributes(item_params)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65.

    66.

              def set_item

    83. 
          
          
              end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
              def search_items
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                filter_params
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                @items = Item.includes(:unit, :stocks)
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                @items.where!(for_sale: for_sale_param)  if params[:for_sale].present?
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                @items.where!(active: params[:active])  if params[:active].present?
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                @items = @items.search(search_term)  if search_term.present?
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                @items = @items.any_tags(*tag_ids)  if tag_ids
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                @items = @items.order('items.name asc').page(@page)
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
              end
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
              def filter_params
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                params[:all] = true  if params[:for_sale].blank?
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
              def for_sale_param
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                ['true', true, '1', 1].include?(params.fetch(:for_sale)) == true ? true : false
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
          
        
      104. 
      
        
    104.

              def item_params

    105. 
          
          
                params.require(:item).permit(:code, :name, :active, :stockable,
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                                             :for_sale, :price, :buy_price, :unit_id, :description)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
              def render_or_redirect_item
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                if request.xhr?
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                  if params[:for_sale] == 'true'
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                    render json: ItemSerializer.new.income([@item]).first
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                  else
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                    render json: ItemSerializer.new.expense([@item]).first
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                  end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                else
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                  redirect_to @item, notice: 'Se ha creado el tem correctamente.'
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
              def new_attrs
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                if params[:for_sale] === 'false'
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  {for_sale: false}
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                else
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  {}
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              end
        
      128.

              def check_loan!

    94.

      95.

                end

          class LoansController < ApplicationController

            # GET /loans

            def index

            # GET /loans_receive/new

            # PATCH /loans/:id
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
            def update
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              @loan = Loan.find(params[:id])
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              if @loan.update_attributes(loan_update_params)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                render json: { success: true }
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              else
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                render json: @loan.errors.messages
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
            end
        
      57.

              def check_logged_in

          1
          
            def update
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              @stock = Stock.find(params[:id])
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              if @stock.save_minimum(params[:minimum])
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                render json: { success: true, id: params[:id], minimum: @stock.minimum }
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              else
        
      12.

            def active?(val)

              val ? 'Activo' : 'Inactivo'

            # Creates an otion link
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
            # @param String text
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            # @param String url
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            # @param String option
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
            def link_option(text, option, options = {})
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              options[:class] = "#{ options[:class] } #{( params[:option] === option ? 'active' : '' )}"
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              url_hash = params.merge(:option => option)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              link_to text, url_for(url_hash), options
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
            end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
            # Presents number to currency
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
            def ntc(val = nil, options = {})
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              #number_to_currency(val.to_f, options)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              number_with_delimiter(val.to_f, t("number.format").merge(options))
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
            end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
            # Format addres to present on the
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
            def nl2br(val)

              unless val.blank?
        
      40.

            def create_options_link
        
      51.

              opts = params

              opts.delete(:controller)
        
      53.

            def tab(text, url, type)

            def with_currency(klass, amount = :amount, options = {})
        
      92.

            # Get file with exchange_rates
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
            def set_exchange_rates
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              file1 = Rails.root.join('public', 'exchange_rates.json')
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              file2 = Rails.root.join('public', 'backup_rates.json')
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
              if not(File.exists?(file1)) || (File.ctime(file1) < Time.now - 4.hours)
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                begin
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  resp = ''
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                  Timeout.timeout(4) { resp = %x[curl http://openexchangerates.org/api/latest.json?app_id=e406e4769281493797fcfd45047773d5] }
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                  r = ActiveSupport::JSON.decode(resp)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  if r['rates'].present?
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                    f = File.new(file2, "w+")
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                    f.write(resp)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                    f.close
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                    f = File.new(file1, "w+")
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                    f.write(resp)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                    f.close
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  else
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                    File.read(file2)
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                  end
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                rescue Exception => e
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                  logger.warn "\n#Timeout::Error getting exchange_rates.json\n"  if e.is_a?(Timeout::Error)
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                  f = File.new(file1, 'w+')
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                  txt = File.read(file2)
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                  f.write txt
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                  f.close
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                  txt
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                end
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
              else
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                File.read(file2)
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
            end
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
            def flash_class(fla)
        
      155. 
      
        
    155.

      156. 
      
        
    156.

      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              when 'alert', :warning then 'alert alert-warning'

      161.

            # Creates the links show, edit, destroy
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
            def bonsai_links(klass, options={})
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              ["edit", "destroy"].inject([]) do |t, m|
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                t << bonsai_method_path(m, klass)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              end.join(" ").html_safe
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            # Set the method and link for  new, edit, destroy, show
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
            def bonsai_method_path(m, klass)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              k = klass.class.to_s.underscore.pluralize.singularize
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              case(m)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                when "new" then link_to "nuevo", send("new_#{k}_path", klass)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                when "show" then link_to "ver", klass, :class => "show_icon", :title => "Ver"
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                when "edit" then link_to "editar", send("edit_#{k}_path", klass), :class => "edit", :title => "Editar"
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                when "destroy" then link_to "borrar", klass, :method => :delete, :class => "delete", :title => "Borrar", :confirm => 'Esta seguro de borrar el item seleccionado', :remote => true
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                else ""
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            end
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1

              if f.object.errors.messages[method].any?
        
      28.

      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1

            def bonsai_title()

    40.

            # Shows the base errors

      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
            def bonsai_form_error(f)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              unless f.object.errors.empty?
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                html = content_tag('h4', 'Exiten errores en el formulario')
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                unless f.object.errors[:base].empty?
        
      53. 
      
        
    53.

                end

            # returns an active value
        
      60.

          module CacheKeysHelper

            def klass_default_key(klass)
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              count = klass.count
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              max_updated_at = klass.maximum(:updated_at).try(:utc).try(:to_s, :to_number)

      6.

            def today_key

      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
            SCRIPTS = {
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              "jquery" => {
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
                klass: "jQuery",
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                cdn: "http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.0.min.js",
        
      7. 
      
        
    7.

                local: "/assets/angular/angular.min.js"
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              }
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            }
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16.

            def cdn_scripts(*args)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              inc = args.map do |src|
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                content_tag(:script, nil, src: get_script(src))
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              end.join("\n")
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              [inc, cdn_scripts_local(*args)].join("\n").html_safe

    22. 
          
          
            end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24.

          1
          
            def cdn_scripts_local(*args)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              html = '<script type="text/javascript">'
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              args.each do |src|
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                html << "\nif(typeof window.#{SCRIPTS[src][:klass]} ===  'undefined') { #{js_load_script src} }"
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              html << "\n</script>"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
            end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
            def js_load_script(src)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              "document.write(unescape(\"%3Cscript src='#{SCRIPTS[src][:local]}' type='text/javascript' %3E%3C/script%3E\"))"
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
            end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
            def get_script(name)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              Rails.env.production? ? SCRIPTS.fetch(name)[:cdn] :  SCRIPTS.fetch(name)[:local]
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            end

    40.

              @tags_list_hash ||= Hash[tags_list.map { |el|
        
      11.

                [el[:id], el]

    app/inputs/autocomplete_input.rb

    1. 
          
          
          class AutocompleteInput < SimpleForm::Inputs::Base
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
            include ActionView::Helpers::FormTagHelper
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            # User the input_options[:value_field for the value of the relation Model
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            def input
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              value_field = input_options[:value_field] || :to_s
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              if object.respond_to? :reflections
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                hid_name = object.reflections[attribute_name].options[:foreign_key] || :"#{attribute_name}_id"
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                relation = attribute_name
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              else
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                hid_name = attribute_name
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                relation = attribute_name.to_s.gsub(/\A(.+)(_id)\z/,'\1')
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              end
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              case
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              when options['data-source'].present?
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                input_html_options['data-source'] = options.delete('data-source')
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              when input_html_options[:data].present? && input_html_options[:data][:source].present?
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                input_html_options['data-source'] = input_html_options[:data].delete(:source)
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              raise 'input_html_options data-source required' unless input_html_options['data-source'].present?
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              value = object.send(relation)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              input_html_options['data-value'] = value
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              input_html_options[:placeholder] = input_html_options[:placeholder] || I18n.t('bonsai.autocomplete_placeholder')
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              input_html_options[:size] ||= SimpleForm.default_input_size
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              out = @builder.hidden_field hid_name
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              out << text_field_tag("#{attribute_name}_autocomplete", value, input_html_options)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              out.html_safe
        
      34. 
      
        
    34.

            def items_stock

            def staff_account

              render :json => contact_account_autocomplete('Staff', params)

            end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
            def get_rates
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              file = File.join(Rails.root, "public/exchange_rates.json")
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              if File.ctime(file) < Time.now - 4.hours
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                resp = %x[curl http://openexchangerates.org/latest.json]
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                begin
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  r = ActionSupport::JSON.decode(resp)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  f = File.new(file, "w+")
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  f.write(r)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                  f.close
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  render :json => r
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                rescue
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  render :json => File.read(file)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              else
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                render :json => File.read(file)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              end
        
      60.

              # Search for contact autocomlete

              def contact_autocomplete(type, options)

    66.

            def money(id)
        
      10.

              @rel.where(t[:account_id].eq(id).or(t[:account_to_id].eq(id)))

      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              def tots_sql
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                <<-SQL
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          SELECT contact_id, SUM(tot_in) as tot_in, SUM(tot_out) AS tot_out FROM(
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
            SELECT contact_id, amount*exchange_rate AS tot_in, 0 as tot_out
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
            FROM accounts
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
            WHERE type IN ('Income','Loans::Give') AND state='approved'
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
            UNION
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            SELECT contact_id, 0 AS tot_in, amount*exchange_rate AS tot_out
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
            FROM accounts
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            WHERE type IN ('Expense','Loans::Receive') AND state='approved'
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          ) AS res GROUP BY contact_id
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                SQL
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              end
        
      27.

            def inverse?
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          174
          
              account_currency != currency && account_currency != account_to_currency
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            end
        
      25.

            def valid?

          74
          
              (account_currency == currency || account_to_currency == currency || same_currency?)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28.

      29.

      30.

            def exchange(val = 1)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          128
          
              ret = if inverse?
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          18
          
                      val * 1 / exchange_rate

                      val * exchange_rate

          class StockWithItem
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
            attr_accessor :unit, :item, :stock
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
          
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          1
          
            def initialize(obj = nil)
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
              @item = obj.item_to_s
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              @unit = obj.item_unit_symbol
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              @stock = obj.quantity
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
            rescue
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
              @stock = BigDecimal.new(0)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
            end
        
      106.

      107.

              def get_ref_io(io)
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          25
          
                _, y, _ = io.ref_number.split('-')
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          25
          
                if y === year
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          25
          
                  "#{op_ref_type}-#{year}-#{"%04\d" % io.id.next}"
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                else
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                  "#{op_ref_type}-#{year}-0001"
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                end

    102. 
          
          
              end

              def year

    106. 
          
          
              end
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
          
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1
          
              def op_ref_type
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                case
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          23
          
                when is_in?    then "I"
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          18
          
                when is_out?   then "E"
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          5
          
                when is_trans? then "T"
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          50

            STATES.each do |m|

              def currency_exchange

            def original_total
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              details.inject(0) {|sum, det| sum += det.quantity.to_f * det.original_price.to_f }.to_d

              def set_due_date_state(h)

          class Movements::Search

            def initialize(args = {}, model)

              @args  = args

    7. 
          
          
              @model = model

      9.

            def search
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              s = model.includes(:contact, :tax, :updater, :creator, :approver, :nuller)
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              #.joins(:contact)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              if args[:search].present?
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                s = s.where("accounts.name ILIKE :s OR accounts.description ILIKE :s OR contacts.matchcode ILIKE :s", s: "%#{ args[:search] }%")
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              s = get_state(s)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              s = set_dates(s)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              s
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
            end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
            private
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              def get_state(s)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                case args[:state]
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                when 'draft', 'approved', 'nulled', 'paid'
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                  s.where(state: args[:state])
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                when 'due'
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  s.where("accounts.state = ? AND accounts.due_date <= ?", 'approved', Date.today)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                when 'error'
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                  s.where(has_error: true)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                else
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                  s
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37.

    38.

      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                s = s.where("accounts.date <= ?", args[:date_end])  if args[:date_end].present?
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                s

              def calculate_total

              # Returns true if calls
        
      100.

          1
          
              def commit_or_rollback(&b)
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          17
          
                res = true
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          17
          
                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          17
          
                  res = b.call
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          17
          
                  raise ActiveRecord::Rollback unless res
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                end
        
      106. 
      
        
    106.

              def tenant_pad(size = 5)

            def expenses_by_item

            def total_expenses
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              @total_expenses ||= begin
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                tot = Expense.active.where(date: date_range.range)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                tot = tot.all_tags(*attrs[:tag_ids])  if any_tags?
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                tot.sum('(accounts.total - accounts.amount) * accounts.exchange_rate')
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              end
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
            end
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
            def total_incomes
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              @total_incomes ||= begin
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                tot = Income.active.where(date: date_range.range)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                tot = tot.all_tags(*attrs[:tag_ids])  if any_tags?
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                tot.sum('(accounts.total - accounts.amount) * accounts.exchange_rate')
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
            end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
            def incomes_dayli
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              data = params(type: 'Income')
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              @incomes_dayli ||= conn.select_rows(dayli_sql(data)).map {|v| DayliReport.new(*v)}
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
            def expenses_dayli
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              data = params(type: 'Expense')
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              @expenses_dayli ||= conn.select_rows(dayli_sql(data)).map {|v| DayliReport.new(*v)}
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
            end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
            def expenses_pecentage
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              @expenses_pecentage ||= 100 * (total_expenses / total)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
            end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
            def incomes_percentage
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              @incomes_pecentage ||= 100 * (total_incomes / total)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
            end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
            def total
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              @total ||= total_incomes + total_expenses
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
            end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
            def contacts_incomes
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              @contacts_incomes ||= conn.select_rows(contacts_sql params(type: 'Income')).map {|v| ContactReport.new(*v)}
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
            end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
            def contacts_expenses
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              @contacts_expenses ||= conn.select_rows(contacts_sql params(type: 'Expense')).map {|v| ContactReport.new(*v)}
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
            end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          private
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
            def offset
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              @offset ||= attrs[:offset].to_i >= 0 ? attrs[:offset].to_i : 0
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
            end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
            def limit
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              @limit ||= attrs[:limit].to_i > 0 ? attrs[:limit].to_i : 10
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
            end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
            def params(extra = {})
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
             ReportParams.new({offset: offset, limit: limit}.merge(extra))
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
            end
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
            def sum_movement_details_sql(data)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
              <<-SQL
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                SELECT i.id, i.name, SUM(d.price * d.quantity * a.exchange_rate) AS total
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                FROM movement_details d JOIN items i ON (i.id = d.item_id)
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                JOIN accounts a ON (a.id = d.account_id)
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                WHERE a.type = '#{data.type}'
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                AND a.state IN ('approved', 'paid')
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                AND a.date BETWEEN '#{date_range.date_start}' AND '#{date_range.date_end}'
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                #{ tags_sql('i') }
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                GROUP BY (i.id)
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                ORDER BY total DESC
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                OFFSET #{data.offset} LIMIT #{data.limit}
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              SQL
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
            end
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
            def tags_sql(table)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              if any_tags?
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                sanitize_sql_array ["AND #{table}.tag_ids @> ARRAY[?]", tag_ids]
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              else
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                ""
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              end
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
            end
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
          
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
            def dayli_sql(data)
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              <<-SQL
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                SELECT SUM((a.total - a.amount) * a.exchange_rate) AS tot, a.date
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                FROM accounts a
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                WHERE a.type = '#{data.type}' and a.state IN ('approved', 'paid')
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                AND a.date BETWEEN '#{date_range.date_start}' AND '#{date_range.date_end}'
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                GROUP BY a.date
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                ORDER BY a.date
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
              SQL
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
            end
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
            def contacts_sql(data)
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              <<-SQL
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              SELECT c.matchcode, SUM((a.total - a.amount) * a.exchange_rate) AS tot
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
              FROM contacts c JOIN accounts a ON (a.contact_id=c.id and a.type='#{data.type}')
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
              WHERE a.date BETWEEN '#{ date_range.date_start }' AND '#{ date_range.date_end }'
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              GROUP BY c.id
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              ORDER BY tot DESC OFFSET #{data.offset} LIMIT #{data.limit}
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              SQL
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
            end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
            def any_tags?
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
              tag_ids.is_a?(Array) && tag_ids.any?
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
            end
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
          
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
            def sanitize_sql_array(ary)
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
              ActiveRecord::Base.send :sanitize_sql_array, ary
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
            end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
            def tag_ids
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
              attrs[:tag_ids]
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
            end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
            def conn
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              ActiveRecord::Base.connection
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
            end
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          end
        
      140.

            def self.minimum_list

            end

            def save_minimum(min)

          4
          
              min = min.is_a?(Numeric) ? min.to_d : min.to_s.to_d

          4
          
              if min < 0
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          2
          
                self.errors[:minimum] << I18n.t("errors.messages.greater_than", count: 0)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          2
          
                false
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              else
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          2
          
                self.minimum = min
        
      39.

          class Store < ActiveRecord::Base

            #include Models::Account::Base

          1
          
            def hash_of_items(item_ids)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              st = stocks.where(:item_id => item_ids).pluck(:item_id, :quantity, :minimum)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              Hash[item_ids.map do |i_id|
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                it = st.find {|v| v[0] === i_id }
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                it = [i_id, 0, ""] if it.nil?
        
      33. 
      
        
    33.

            def operations
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              @operations ||= operations_filter.includes(:creator, :approver, :nuller, :updater, :tax)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              .order('date desc, id desc').page(page)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
            end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40.

            def operations_filter
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              case context.params[:operation]
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              when 'all' then to_model.accounts.operations
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              when 'income' then to_model.accounts.where(type: 'Income')
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              when 'expense' then to_model.accounts.where(type: 'Expense')
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              when 'loangive' then to_model.accounts.where(type: 'Loans::Give')
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              when 'loanreceive' then to_model.accounts.where(type: 'Loans::Receive')
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
            end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
            def page
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              p = context.params[:page].to_i
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              p > 0 ? p : 1
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
            def operation_partial(operation)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              case operation.class.to_s
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              when 'Income'
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                context.render partial: 'contacts/income', locals: { income: present(operation) }
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              when 'Expense'
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                context.render partial: 'contacts/expense', locals: { expense: present(operation) }
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              when 'Loans::Give', 'Loans::Receive'
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                context.render partial: 'contacts/loan', locals: { loan: present(operation) }
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
            end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          end

    app/presenters/history_presenter.rb

    0.0 % covered
