    1. 
          
          
          class HistoryPresenter < BasePresenter
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
            attr_reader :klass
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            def changes
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              if new_item?
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                template.text_green_dark 'cre el registro', nil, 'b'
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              else
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                if (ch = present_changes).present?
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                  ch.html_safe
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                else
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                  'modific la fecha de actualizacin'.html_safe
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              end
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            end
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
            def present_changes
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              history.except('updated_at').map do |key, val|
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                from, to = format_for(val[:from], val[:type]), format_for(val[:to], val[:type])
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                "#{attr_text key} de #{code from} a #{code to}"
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              end.join(', ')
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            def klass
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              @klass ||= klass_type.underscore
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
            end
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
            private
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              def translate_attribute(k)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                t("#{t_klass}.attributes.#{k}") || t("common.#{k}")
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              def attr_text(k)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                text_gray(translate_attribute(k), nil, 'b')
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              def t_klass
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                @t_klass ||= klass.to_s.split('/').join('.')
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              def format_for(val, typ)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                case typ
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                when 'string', 'text', 'integer', 'float'
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  val
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                when 'boolean'
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  "<i class='icon-#{val}'></i>"
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                when 'date', 'datetime', 'time'
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                  context.lo val
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                when 'decimal'
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  context.ntc val
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          end
        
      54.

    app/presenters/income_history_presenter.rb

    0.0 % covered

    31 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 31 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          class IncomeHistoryPresenter < MovementHistoryPresenter
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
            def movement
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              'Ingreso'
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            end
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            def details
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              income_details
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
            end
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            def details_col
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              :income_details
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            def inventory_operation
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              get_inventory_operation  if inventory_operation?
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
            end
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
            def inventory_operation?
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              ['inventory_in', 'inventory_out'].include? operation_type
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
            end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
            def get_inventory_operation
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              if operation_type == 'inventory_out'
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                "Entrega de inventario #{inventory_operation_tag}"
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              else
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                context.text_red 'Devolucin de inventario'
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
            end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            def inventory_operation_tag
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              if delivered?
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                text_green 'completo', nil, 'b'
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              else
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                text_green 'parcial', nil
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
            end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          end

            def income_payment

      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                <p class="help-block">
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                  Los cobros o devoluciones con
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  <span class="label label-warning"><i class="icon-warning"></i> Pendiente</span>
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                  necesitan verificacin o anulacin
        
      21. 
      
        
    21.

            end
        
      31.

      32.

            def deliver_inventory_button

    36. 
          
          
                end
        
      37.

              end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
            end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40.

          class InventoryPresenter < BasePresenter
        
      5.

            def link
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              case
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              when(is_income? || is_expense?)
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                "/inventories/#{id}/show_movement"
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              when is_trans?
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                "/inventories/#{id}/show_trans"
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              else
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                to_model

    14.

    15. 
          
          
            end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
            def operation_tag
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              case operation
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              when 'in' then text_green(operation_name)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              when 'out' then text_red(operation_name)
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              when 'inc_out' then text_green(operation_name)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              when 'inc_in' then text_red(operation_name)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              when 'exp_in' then text_green(operation_name)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              when 'exp_out' then text_red(operation_name)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              when 'trans' then text_gray(operation_name)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              end
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
            end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
            def operation_name
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              case operation
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              when 'in' then 'Ingreso inventario'
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              when 'out' then 'Egreso inventario'
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              when 'inc_out' then 'Entrega'
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              when 'inc_in' then 'Devolucin'
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              when 'exp_in' then 'Recepcin'
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              when 'exp_out' then 'Devolucin'
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              when 'trans' then 'Transferencia'
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
            def select_store_title
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              case
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              when (transaction.is_a?(Income) and inventory_operation.out?)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                "<span class='dark_green'>Entrega</span>".html_safe
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              when (transaction.is_a?(Income) and inventory_operation.in?)
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                "<span class='red'>Devolucin</span>".html_safe
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              when (transaction.is_a?(Buy) and inventory_operation.in?)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                "<span class='dark_green'>Recojo</span>".html_safe
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              when (transaction.is_a?(Buy) and inventory_operation.out?)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                "<span class='red'>Devolucin</span>".html_safe
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
            end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
            def related(st_id = nil)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              case
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              when is_income?  then income
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              when is_expense? then expense
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              when(is_trans? && st_id.present?)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                store_id === st_id ? store_to : store
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              when(is_trans? && st_id.nil?)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                store_to
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              else
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                nil
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
            end
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
            def has_related?
        
      68.

              is_income? || is_expense? || is_trans?
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
            end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          
        
      71.

            def related_tip(st_id = nil)
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              case
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              when is_income?
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                I18n.t('presenters.inventory.related_tip.income')
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              when is_expense?
        
      76.

                I18n.t('presenters.inventory.related_tip.expense')
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
              when(is_trans? && st_id == store_id && st_id.present?)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78.

      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              when(is_trans? && st_id != store_id && st_id.present?)

                I18n.t('presenters.inventory.related_tip.store_source')

    81.

      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
              end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
            end
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
          
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
            def transaction_title

              "#{select_store_title} #{sanitize transaction}".html_safe

      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          
        
      90.

            def title
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              store = h.link_to inventory_operation.store, store_path(inventory_operation.store_id, tab: 'operations'), class: 'n'
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              case
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
              when( inventory_operation.transaction_id.present? && transaction.is_a?(Income) && inventory_operation.out? )

    95. 
          
          
                "<span class='gray n'>Entrega</span> #{store} - #{sanitize transaction}".html_safe
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              when( inventory_operation.transaction_id.present? && transaction.is_a?(Income) && inventory_operation.in? )

                "<span class='gray n'>Devolucin</span> #{store} - #{sanitize transaction}".html_safe
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              when( inventory_operation.transaction_id.present? && transaction.is_a?(Buy) && inventory_operation.in? )

    99. 
          
          
                "<span class='gray n'>Recojo</span> #{sanitize transaction}".html_safe
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
              when( inventory_operation.transaction_id.present? && transaction.is_a?(Income) && inventory_operation.out? )
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                "<span class='gray n'>Devolucin</span> #{sanitize store} - #{sanitize transaction}".html_safe
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              when inventory_operation.in?
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                "<span class='gray n'>Ingreso</span> #{sanitize store}".html_safe

    104. 
          
          
              when inventory_operation.out?

    105.

              when inventory_operation.transout? || inventory_operation.transin?

      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
              end
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
            end
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
            def link_related
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
              if inventory_operation.transference_id.present?
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                trans = inventory_operation.transference
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                txt = inventory_operation.operation == "transout" ? "a" : "desde"
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                h.link_to "Transferencia #{txt} #{inventory_operation.store_to}", trans, title: "Transferencia a #{inventory_operation.store_to}"
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
              elsif inventory_operation.contact_id.present?
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                cont = inventory_operation.contact
        
      118.

                h.link_to cont, cont, title: contact_tooltip
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              end

            end

    app/presenters/ledger_operation_presenter.rb

    38.89 % covered

    54 relevant lines. 21 lines covered and 33 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          class LedgerOperationPresenter < BasePresenter
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            attr_reader :current_id, :klass
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
            delegate :operation_tag, :operation_text, to: :klass
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
            def initialize(ledger, current_id, v_context)
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              super(ledger, v_context)
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              @current_id = current_id
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              set_operation_klass
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            end
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
            def set_operation_klass
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              if unrelated_operation?
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                @klass = UnrelatedOperation.new(self)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              elsif is_positive?
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                @klass = PositiveLedgerOperation.new(self)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              elsif is_negative?
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                @klass = NegativeLedgerOperation.new(self)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              end
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
            end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
            def unrelated_operation?
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              ['trans', 'payin', 'devin', 'payout', 'devout',
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
               'lrcre', 'lrpay', 'lrint',
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
               'lgcre', 'lgpay', 'lgint'
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              ].include?(operation)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
            end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
            def related_operation?
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              ['servex', 'servin'].include?(operation)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
            end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
            def is_positive?
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              current_id == account_id && account.is_a?(Income) || current_id == account_to_id && account_to.is_a?(Income)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
            end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
            def is_negative?
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              current_id == account_id && account.is_a?(Expense) || current_id == account_to_id && account_to.is_a?(Expense)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          # No relation for current_account_id
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
          class UnrelatedOperation < Struct.new(:presenter)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
            delegate :operation, :text_green, :text_red, to: :presenter
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
            def operation_tag
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              case operation
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              when 'payin', 'devout', 'lrcre', 'lgpay', 'lgint'
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                text_green(operation_text)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              when 'payout', 'devin', 'lgcre', 'lrpay', 'lrint'
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                text_red(operation_text)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              when 'trans'
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                'Transferencia'
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
            end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
            def operation_text
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              case operation
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                when 'trans' then 'Transferencia'
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                when 'payin' then 'Cobro ingreso'
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                when 'payout' then 'Pago egreso'
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                when 'devin' then 'Devolucin ingreso'
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                when 'devout' then 'Devolucin egreso'
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                when 'lrcre' then 'Ingreso prestamo'
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                when 'lrpay' then 'Pago perstamo'
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                when 'lrint' then 'Pago intereses'
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                when 'lgcre' then 'Egreso prestamo'
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                when 'lgint' then 'Cobro intereses'
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                when 'lgpay' then 'Cobro prestamo'
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
            end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74.

    app/presenters/loan_history_presenter.rb

    0.0 % covered

    45 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 45 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          class LoanHistoryPresenter < HistoryPresenter
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
            def changes
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              if new_item?
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
                template.text_green_dark 'cre el registro', nil, 'b'
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              else
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                if (ch = present_changes).present?
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                  "modific: <br/>#{ch}".html_safe
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                else
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                  'modific la fecha de actualizacin'.html_safe
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                end
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              end
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            def present_changes
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              arr = history.except('extras').map do |k, v|
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                from, to = format_for(v[:from], v[:type]), format_for(v[:to], v[:type])
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                "#{attr_text k} de #{code from} a #{code to}"
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              arr << extra_changes
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              arr.compact.join(', ')
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            def extra_changes
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              if lextras.present? && (lextras['to'].present? || lextras['from'].present?)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                interests_changes  if lextras['to']['interests'].present?
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              end
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
            end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
            def interests_changes
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              from = context.ntc get_lextras_from('interests')
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              to = context.ntc get_lextras_to('interests')
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              "#{attr_text 'interests'} de #{code from} a #{code to}"
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
            end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
            def get_lextras_from(key)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              get_lextras('from', key)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
            end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            def get_lextras_to(key)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              get_lextras('to', key)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
            end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
            def get_lextras(al, key)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              lextras[al][key]
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
            rescue
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              nil
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
            end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
            def lextras
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              history_data['extras']
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
            end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          end
        
      53.

            class MovementHistoryItem

      38.

      39.

      42.

      43.

              def item_was

    44. 
          
          
                items_hash[item_id_was]
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              [:price, :quantity, :balance].each do |meth|
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                define_method meth do
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  BigDecimal.new(details[meth.to_s])
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52.

    53.

      54.

                    BigDecimal.new(details["#{meth}_was"])
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  rescue
        
      56. 
      
        
    56.

      57. 
      
        
    57.

      58. 
      
        
    58.

      69.

      70.

              def subtotal

              def subtotal_was

                price_was * quantity_was

              end
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              # Present if the item changed
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
              def changed(field)
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                case field
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                when 'item'
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                  return send(field)  unless changed?(field)
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                  "de #{code details["#{field}_was"]} a #{ code details[field]}".html_safe
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                when 'price', 'quantity', 'balance'
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                  return ntc send(field)  unless changed?(field)
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
          
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                  "de #{code ntc(send(:"#{field}_was"))} a #{ code ntc(send(field))}".html_safe
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                when 'subtotal'
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                  return ntc(subtotal)  unless subtotal_changed?
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                  "de #{code ntc(subtotal_was)} a #{ code ntc(subtotal)}".html_safe
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                end
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
              end
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              def changed?(field)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                !new_record? && !destroyed? && details["#{field}_was"].present?
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
              def line_change_css

                return 'line-new' if new_record?
        
      102.

      103.

      104.

                details["#{field}_was"].present? ? 'red' : ''
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          
        
      117.

              def subtotal_was
        
      118.

                if subtotal_changed?

      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                end
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
              def subtotal

                price * quantity
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
              end

      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              def subtotal_changed?
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                (details['price_was'].present? || details['quantity_was'].present?) && !(new_record?)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
              end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
            end

          class MovementHistoryPresenter < HistoryPresenter

            def changes

            def present_changes

    14. 
          
          
              res = [filter_changes, details_changes].flatten.compact.join(', ')

    16. 
          
          
              if res.present?
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                res
        
      18.

      22.

            def filter_changes
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              @filter_changes ||= history.except('updated_at').map do |key, val|
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                case key
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                when 'state' then state_html(key, val)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                when 'error_messages', 'extras', 'updater_id',
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                     'nuller_id', 'approver_id', 'balance_inventory',
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                     'operation_type', details_col.to_s
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                  nil
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                else
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  val.present? ? get_change(key, val) : nil
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
            end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
            def get_change(key, val)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              return  if val.is_a?(Array)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              get_history_attribute(key, val)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
            end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
            def get_history_attribute(key, val)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              case key
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              when 'delivered' then
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                inventory_state(val)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              else
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                present_history_attribute(key, val)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
            end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
            def present_history_attribute(key, val)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
             [attr_text(key), ' de ',
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
               code(format_for(val[:from], val[:type])), ' a ',
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
               code(format_for(val[:to], val[:type]))
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              ].join('')
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
            end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
            # extras hstore
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
            def history_extras_to
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              @history_extras_to ||= Hash[
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                history_data['extras']['to'].map { |k, v| [k, v.to_s] }
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              ]
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
            end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
            def inventory_state(val)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              ['Inventario de', code(inventory_tag(val[:from])), code(inventory_tag(val[:to]))].join('')
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
            end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
            def inventory_tag(val)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              if val
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                label_green('IC', 'Inventario completo')
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              else
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                label_yellow('IP', 'Inventario pendiente')
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
            end
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
            def state_html(k, v)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              [translate_attribute(k), ' de ',
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
               state_trans(v[:from]), ' a ', state_trans(v[:to])
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              ].join('')
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
            end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
            def state_trans(st)
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
              case st
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              when 'draft' then text_gray('Borrador', nil, 'b')
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              when 'due' then '<span class="text-error b">Atrasado</span>'
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              when 'approved' then text_green('Aprobado', nil, 'b')
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              when 'paid' then text_green_dark('pagado', nil, 'b')
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              when 'nulled' then text_red('Anulado', nil, 'b')
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
            end
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
            def inventory_operation;  end
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
            def change_inventory
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              return  if mov_extras.blank? || mov_extras['from']['inventory'].blank?
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              from, to = mov_extras['from']['inventory'], mov_extras['to']['inventory']
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              if from.present? || to.present?
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                arr = ['Inventario INACTIVO', 'Inventario ACTIVO']
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                from, to = from.to_s == 'true' ? arr.reverse : arr
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                "#{attr_text 'inventory'} de #{code from} a #{code to}"
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
            end
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
          
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
            def details_changes
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              if history_data[details_col.to_s].present?
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                [context.link_to('Cambio en tems', context.movement_detail_history_path(id) , class: 'ajax')]
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
              end
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
            end
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
          end
        
      112.

          class PaymentPresenter
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
            def initialize(transaction)
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              @transaction = transaction
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            end
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            def accounts
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              if @transaction.is_a? Income
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                Account.contact_money(@transaction.contact_id)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              else
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                Account.contact_money_buy(@transaction.contact_id)
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
            end
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
            def devolution_accounts
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              [Account.contact_account(@transaction.contact_id, @transaction.currency_id)] + Account.money.all
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
            end
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
            def to_hash
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              Hash[accounts.pluck(:id, :name , :currency_id).map do |a, b, c|
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                [a, {:name => b, :currency_id => c}]
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              end]
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          end

          class ReportPresenter < Struct.new(:view_context)

            def pendent_ledgers

              if total > 0

              end

    app/presenters/store_presenter.rb

    1. 
          
          
          # encoding: utf-8
        
      2.

          # author: Boris Barroso

      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          class StorePresenter < BasePresenter
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            def address_tag
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              "#{ icon 'icon-building muted', 'Direccin' } #{sanitize address}".html_safe  if address.present?
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            end
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            def phone_tag
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              "#{ icon 'icon-phone muted', 'Telfono' } #{sanitize phone}".html_safe  if phone.present?
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            end
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
            def items(attrs = {})
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              if attrs[:search_items].present?
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                st = stocks.item_like(attrs[:search_items])
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              else
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                st = stocks
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              st = st.mins  if attrs[:minimum_inventory].present?
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              st.includes(:item).page(page attrs[:page_items]).order('items.name')
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
            end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            def inventories(attrs = {})
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              inv = Inventory.includes(:creator, :income, :expense)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              .where("store_id=:id OR store_to_id=:id", id: id)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              if attrs[:search_operations].present?
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                s = "%#{ attrs[:search_operations] }%"
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                inv = inv.where{ ref_number.like s }
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              elsif valid_date_range?(attrs)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                inv = inv.where(date: date_range(attrs).range)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              inv.page(page attrs[:page_operations]).order("date desc, id desc")
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
            end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
            private
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              def date_range(attrs)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                DateRange.parse(attrs[:date_start], attrs[:date_end])
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              def valid_date_range?(attrs = {})
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                attrs[:date_start].present? && attrs[:date_end].present?
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              def page(val)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                is_valid_page?(val) ? val : 1
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              def is_valid_page?(val)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                val.present? && val.to_i > 0
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              end

            def self.find(organisation, user_id)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              user = organisation.users.find(user_id)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              _object = new(slice_user_attributes(user))
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              _object.organisation = organisation
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              _object.set_user(user)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              link = user.links.where(organisation_id: organisation.id).first!
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              _object.set_link(link)
        
      68.

      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              _object
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
            end

              def set_user_errors

          8

              # Generates a random password and sets it to the password field

              def random_password(size = 8)

          4
          
                SecureRandom.urlsafe_base64(size)

      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
              def set_user_attributes
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                user.attributes = attributes.except(:role, :organisation)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106.

              def api_token
        
      109.

          8

            # Receives a Income or Expense instance and calculates
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
            # the balance for each currency
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
            def object_balance(obj)

    21. 
          4
          
              create_balances
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          4
          
              @h['TOTAL'] = (@h['TOTAL'] + (obj.amount) * obj.exchange_rate).round(2)

    24. 
          4

              def set_base_currency
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          7
          
                if base_currency_transaction && base_currency_transaction.tot.to_d != 0.0

          6

              def set_other_currencies

          7

      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          12

    40. 
          
          
                end
        
      41.

      43.

          1
          
              def calculate_total
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          27
          
                transactions.inject(0) { |sum, trans| sum += trans.tot.to_d }.round(2)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
              def base_currency_transaction
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          25

              end
        
      50.

          1
          
              def other_currencies_transactions

    52. 
          20

    53.

          class ControllerServiceSerializer < Struct.new(:model)
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
            def to_json(methods: [], only: [], except: [])
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          5
          
              opts = {}
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          5
          
              opts[:methods] = (Array(methods) + [:errors, :to_s]).uniq
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          5
          
              opts[:only] = only  if Array(only).any?
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          5
          
              opts[:except] = except  if Array(except).any?
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          5
          
              opts[:methods].push(:destroyed?)  if model.destroyed?
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
          
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          5
          
              model.to_json(opts)
        
      12.

            def range_sql_tag_group
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          <<-SQL
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          SELECT items.name, SUM(details.balance) as quantity, items.unit_symbol,
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          to_json(accounts.tag_ids) AS tag_ids
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          FROM items
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          JOIN movement_details as details ON (details.item_id = items.id)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          JOIN (
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
            SELECT id, array_intersection(tag_ids, ARRAY#{ tag_group.tag_ids }) AS tag_ids,
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
            type, state, date, due_date
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
            FROM accounts
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          ) AS accounts
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          ON (details.account_id = accounts.id)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          WHERE accounts.type = :type AND accounts.state = :state
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          AND #{date_field} BETWEEN :date_start AND :date_end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          GROUP BY items.id, accounts.tag_ids
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          ORDER BY items.name
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          SQL
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
            end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
            def range_sql
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          <<-SQL
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          SELECT items.name, SUM(details.balance) AS quantity, items.unit_symbol
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          FROM items
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          JOIN movement_details as details ON (details.item_id = items.id)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          JOIN accounts
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          ON (details.account_id = accounts.id)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          WHERE accounts.type = :type AND accounts.state = :state
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
          AND #{date_field} BETWEEN :date_start AND :date_end
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          GROUP BY items.id
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          ORDER BY items.name
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          SQL
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
            end
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          end
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
          =begin
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          set search_path to bonsai;
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          select items.name, sum(details.quantity), items.unit_symbol FROM items
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          JOIN movement_details as details ON (details.item_id = items.id)
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          WHERE details.account_id IN(
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
              select id from accounts where type='Income' and state='approved'
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          and due_date <= '2014-07-19'
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          )
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          GROUP BY items.id
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
          =end

              def get_updated_balance
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                tot_was = @movement.total_was.to_s === "NaN" ? 0 : @movement.total_was

    70. 
          
          
                tot = @movement.total.to_s === "NaN" ? 0 : @movement.total
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                bal = @movement.balance.to_s === "NaN" ? 0 : @movement.balance
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                bal - (tot_was - tot.round(2))
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              end

              def update_operation_balance

          7

              def number_to_words(num)
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          8
          
                hundreds = num[0,1].to_i
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          8
          
                tens = num[1,1].to_i
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          8
          
                units = num[2,1].to_i
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          8
          
                text = Array.new
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          8
          
                if hundreds > 0
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          5
          
                  if hundreds == 1 && (tens + units == 0)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                    text << self.hundreds[0]
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                  else
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          5
          
                    text << self.hundreds[hundreds]
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                  end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                end
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
          
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          8
          
                if tens > 0
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          5
          
                  case tens
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                    when 1
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                      text << (units == 0 ? self.tens[tens] : self.teens[units])
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                    when 2
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
                      text << (units == 0 ? self.tens[tens] : self.twenties[units])
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                    else
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          4
          
                      text << self.tens[tens]
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                  end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          8
          
                if units > 0
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          8
          
                  if tens == 0
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          3
          
                    text << self.units[units]
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                  elsif tens > 2
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          4
          
                    text << "#{self.and_string} #{self.units[units]}"
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                  end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                end
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          
        
      101.

          8

              def create_groups(groups)

          3
          
                (1..10).each do |num|
        
      106.

          30
          
                  if groups[num].to_i > 0
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          5
          
                    case num
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                    when 1, 3, 5, 7, 9
        
      109.

          3
          
                      words << "mil"
        
      110. 
      
        
    110.

      111.

          2

      112. 
      
        
    112.

      113.
